text: Adam Henryk Małysz (born 3 December 1977 in Wisła, Poland) is a Polish former ski jumper. He has four Olympic medals (3 silver, 1 bronze). His longest jump was 230,5 meters. Since 2011, he has been a rally driver. ==1st places== Day Year Location Hill K-point HS Jump 1 Jump 2 Note (points) 1\. 17 March 1996 Oslo Holmenkollbakken K-110 – 106,5 m 121,5 m 249.4 2\. 18
